summary: A married couple of psychiatrists has their relationship tested when one suffers a mental breakdown.
cast: Liv Ullmann|Erland Josephson|Aino Taube|Gunnar Björnstrand|Kristina Adolphson|Marianne Aminoff|Gösta Ekman|Helene Friberg|Ulf Johansson|Sven Lindberg|Jan-Erik Lindqvist|Birger Malmsten|Sif Ruud|Göran Stangertz|Mona Andersson|Daniel Bergman|Donya Feuer|Käbi Laretei|Lena Olin|Rebecca Pawlo|Margareta Pettersson|Tore Segelcke|Kari Sylwan
title: Cara a cara al desnudo
